title: Can I pay with € on NA server?
body: I transported myself from EUNE to NA. Here we pay in €, but you pay in USD. If I will buy a 10€ paysafe card and put the code in the ¸¸buying center¸¸ will it work ? Or do I have to buy a paysafe card in USD? Why do i need rp? (Pulsfire {{champion:51}}  )

replies.body: Each server has RP cards specific to that region.  If you buy an EU RP Card it won't work on NA, so you'll want to purchase an NA card.  We can help find some options and payment methods for you, just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our billing team will take a look and get back to you as soon as we can!
